title: EMCL Envelope
description: Encrypted Message Context Layer envelope used by IntentusNet transports.

emclVersion.description: Semantic version of the EMCL protocol implementation (e.g. '1.0').

ciphertext.description: Base64-encoded AES-GCM ciphertext OR plaintext string for HMAC mode.

nonce.description: Base64-encoded AES-GCM nonce OR hashed nonce for HMAC mode.

hmac.description: HMAC signature for integrity in HMAC mode. Empty string for AES-GCM.

identityChain.description: Chain of agent/service identities that processed this envelope.
